comments:

Reassigning to Bianca.  I believe this is for you, Bianca.  If not, please reassign as you see appropriate.

Wasn't able to exactly reproduce this bug. But since this NPE happens in TestLogVerdictCollection.collectVerdicts(), I'm using this record to optimize the loading of test logs by not to re-collect verdicts in TestLogVerdictCollection, but  to use TPFVerdictList introduced in 4.1. This change should fix this problem on the side.

Available in 3/7 build. Paul, could you please verify this fix? Thanks. - Bianca
Verified in the TPTP V4.2.0 (TPTP-4.2.0-200604030200) driver.
